ctx: intros l i i' H_sorted H_lt.
induction l as [| e es IH]; simpl.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros l i i' H_sorted H_lt. unfold removeAfterIndex. induction l as [| e es IH]; simpl. - reflexivity. - destruct (eIndex e <=? i) eqn:Heq. + simpl. rewrite IH; auto. + simpl. rewrite IH; auto.
